channel.title: Need a really good coders advice
channel.description: Ok i have no clue if its even possible, but could it be possible to make a ban command for when someone teams or pjes? like the noclip one where they get auto banned?

item.title: Need a really good coders advice
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Um, it would probably be something like: if player is attacked within (timer = 3) Banuser +playername+ or something like that, i dont really know, ask a c++ coder.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a really good coders advice
